generations.content_context: ElizaOS v1.7.0 Discord bot integrations were failing with "No server ID found" errors due to incomplete `serverId` → `messageServerId` migration, prompting an urgent fix path (PR #6333 / odi-17 branch) and guidance to temporarily downgrade to v1.6.5.
